comments:
build i1005

I had a workspace from i0928 and I downloaded and installed build i1005. On
first startup, I got the following in my log file. I was also prompted with an
Error dialog saying that the workbench layout could not be restored. It reset
all my customized perspectives, closed all my editors, and left only the
Resource perspective open.

I believe the editor on top was on a class file in an external library. (whose
location would have changed when I did the upgrade)
